sources.title: North To The Klondike (1942)
sources.description: Broderick Crawford, Evelyn Ankers, Andy Devine, Lon Chaney

metadata.Plot: Nate Carson (Lon Chaney, Jr.) plans to run off the group of homesteaders out of the valley they have settled in in order to get the gold he believes is there. But the mining engineer, (John Thorn (Broderick Crawford) he initially employed sets out to see that his former boss doesn't get away with it.
metadata.Writer: Jack London, Clarence Upson Young, Louis Sarecky
metadata.Actors: Broderick Crawford, Evelyn Ankers, Andy Devine
